message: Maybe--but it's the truth. Their actions are also getting old.

I agree with your opinion on Clinton, but not with Trump. Trump will wage war and also get the rich richer. It doesn't matter anyway, because our rights will be taken away and we won't have much to live for soon. I'd rather die fighting against this tyrannical and corrupt government who doesn't have the balls to tell the people the truth, that many of the """"conspiracies"""" are true. That officials are being sold out to the richest families in the world. It's the beginning of the end.

No one said anything about hate. You're the one who brought that up. If you were raised a Christian, then you know the story the Bible warns about. Sodom and Gomorrah. Argue that one with God. I didn't write the book.

You obviously haven't been here long have you .

""""God...your a smart dude..wow!"""" (I probably just seem that way relative to you.) My real point is I'm saying you should listen to the guys who ARE smart dudes... the PhD's in the field. (I asked you where the """"real scientists"""" you mentioned work.) I mean, isn't it odd that you can't find a single actual scientific organization that agrees with you? Surely you can find at least ONE. Otherwise, you're saying every scientific organization on Earth disagrees with you on this, a science issue. Despite your """"real scientists that says the ice mass is growing"""" comment. (Still waiting for your evidence on that one!)

I found out they fed my newborn a bottle of formula and """"some sugar water"""" right after delivery (had a c-section) even though I asked them to bring the baby to me for feeding, which I was completely able to do although inexperienced. Also, I asked for BF support the second day, but was told the woman was not available that day. Took a few tries but my baby & I finally figured it out on our own. A lot of stress could have been avoided with just a little support.
